name: Save The Octo
description:
Save the octo is an unusual reaction game for all fans of the genre. Rescue an octopus trapped inside a bag of water. The package is constantly breaking and only your reaction and attentiveness can save the eight-legged friend from death. Collect as many points as possible in three game modes: difficult (for extreme lovers), simple (for beginners) and timekiller for those who have nowhere to rush

Features:
- Unusual gameplay
- Nice graphics
- Achievements
- Nice soundtrack
